headline: Dow (DOW) Valuation Check After Macquarie Infrastructure Deal and $1 Billion Cost-Reduction Plan
summary: Strategic deal reshapes Dow’s balance sheet Dow (DOW) has been back on investors radar after completing a major partnership with Macquarie, selling a 49% stake in its U.S. Gulf Coast infrastructure assets and pulling in roughly $3 billion in cash. See our latest analysis for Dow. Despite a steep year to date share price decline of 37.83 percent and a three year total shareholder return of negative 42.77 percent, the recent 11.27 percent one month share price return suggests sentiment is...
